      • initEngine

        public void initEngine(java.io.File blackBrainFile,
              java.io.File redBrainFile)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        blackBrainFile - InstructionSet[] containing a parsed ant brain
        redBrainFile - InstructionSetp[] containing a parsed ant brain
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception thrown if world cant be populated with ants

      • loadWorld

        public void loadWorld(java.io.File worldFile)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      RowNumberException,
                      RowDoesntStartWithWhitespaceException,
                      ColumnNumberException,
                      java.lang.Exception
        parses the world file into a World object and puts it into the gameFile if successful
        Parameters:
        worldFile - a text file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Can't read file
        RowNumberException - formal and actual number of rows differ
        RowDoesntStartWithWhitespaceException - Odd row doesn't start with a whitespace
        ColumnNumberException - formal and actual number of column differ
        java.lang.Exception - General exception

      • loadRandomWorld

        public void loadRandomWorld()
        uses the WorldFactory to generate a random world according to tournament requirements and updates the gameFile field by putting this world as the current world

      • runSimulator

        public void runSimulator(int getToThisManyCompletedRuns)
        the fields currentWorld executeOneROund() instruction is executed as many times as the parameter suggests the counter executed Rounds is incremented
        Parameters:
        getToThisManyCompletedRuns - number of round to be executed
